QuestData.Title: Fisherman's Tale
QuestData.Description: The villagers of Zouchin know the coast better than anyone in Kun-Lai. If the Zandalari are hiding on one of the islands, they will know.$b$bMishi will take you as far as Emperor's Path. I will go ahead to speak with the village elders.$b$bFollow the path to Whispercloud Rise. Shin Whispercloud will help you reach the village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Mishi to travel to the Path of Conquerors. From there find Shin Whispercloud at Whispercloud Rise.
QuestData.RewardText: The elders have agreed to help us figure out where the Zandalari have hidden the Thunder King's remains.$b$bThey have a few conditions though...

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Mishi outside of Lei Shen's Tomb
Speak to Shin Whispercloud to access Zouchin Province
